translations: adj.朴实的，质朴的；（人）严肃的，严厉的；（生活）简朴的，苦行的；（开支）紧缩的，节制的

phrs.translation: 严峻的, 朴素的, 简朴的, 严肃的
朴素的, 严肃的, 严峻的
严峻指命, 严峻指明
紧缩财政, 紧缩预算

sentences.sentence: The life of the troops was still comparatively austere.
sentences.translation: 部队生活相对而言仍然简朴。

sentences.sentence: The room was austere, nearly barren of furniture or decoration.
sentences.translation: 这个房间很简朴，几乎没有什么家具或装饰。

sentences.sentence: These days the word "kefir" is consequently more likely to bring to mind glamorous, yoga mat-toting women from Los Angeles than austere visions of blustery Eastern Europe.
sentences.translation: 因此，如今“开菲尔”这个词更容易让人联想到来自洛杉矶、带着瑜伽垫的魅力四射的女性，而不是那种狂风大作的东欧的简朴景象。
